lines.text: Today we're going to study about...

[looking at a comic book]
Ancient history?

[balancing other students on their heads]
Acrobatics?
The study of musical instruments is the subject for today.

[singing]
The study of musical instruments is the subject for today!

[plays a band song]
Did you ever stop to think, when the band plays "rink-a-tink", where all the music comes from? From a Toot, and a Whistle, and a Plunk, and a Boom.
That's where the music comes from!
